lines.text: Center of mass has constant velocity

secText:
Lesson:
1. Define the [OBJ:expsec_g668:center of mass] of an object.
2. Calculate the [OBJ:expsec_g669:center of mass of an object].
3. Determine the effect on the center of mass of an object [OBJ:expsec_g670:when the object is moving].
4. Determine the effect on the center of mass [OBJ:expsec_g671:in a collision].

In-class assessment:
1. [OBJ:qc_37460:Calculate] the center of mass of an object.
